channel.title: Stuck in Blast pits elevator shaft
channel.description:
When falling down in the deep elevator shaft at the Blast Pit for the second time the door which you go through after going forward in the sewer part can't be opened. The character is stuck and there is no way to return.
Note that this only happened when going through that section for the second time, the first time there was no problem going through.
map: bm_c1a4c at: -3201.974854 x, -1461.372437 y, -159.968750z.
![Hv9q8|690x388](upload://6x4ttZL5TCUZAAJGm5iEDGJ7Rxv.jpeg)

item.title: Stuck in Blast pits elevator shaft
item.dc:creator: chaosblasta
item.description:
Can confirm this same bug, too.
